mapper.select: SELECT m.message_no, m.message_contents, TO_CHAR(m.message_senddate,'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS message_senddate, m.message_sender_no, m.message_receiver_no, s.sender_name, s.sender_id, s.sender_dept_name, s.sender_office_name, s.sender_position_name, r.receiver_name, r.receiver_id, r.receiver_dept_name, r.receiver_office_name, r.receiver_position_name FROM (SELECT message_no, message_contents, message_senddate, message_sender_no, message_receiver_no FROM message WHERE (message_sender_no = #{message_sender_no} AND message_receiver_no = #{message_receiver_no}) OR (message_receiver_no = #{message_sender_no} AND message_sender_no = #{message_receiver_no})) m, (SELECT emp_no AS sender_no, emp_name AS sender_name, emp_id AS sender_id, d.dept_name AS sender_dept_name, o.office_name AS sender_office_name, p.position_name AS sender_position_name FROM emp e, dept d, office o, position p WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.office_no = o.office_no AND e.position_no = p.position_no AND e.emp_resigndate IS NULL) s, (SELECT emp_no AS receiver_no, emp_name AS receiver_name, emp_id AS receiver_id, d.dept_name AS receiver_dept_name, o.office_name AS receiver_office_name, p.position_name AS receiver_position_name FROM emp e, dept d, office o, position p WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.office_no = o.office_no AND e.position_no = p.position_no AND e.emp_resigndate IS NULL) r WHERE m.message_sender_no = s.sender_no AND m.message_receiver_no = r.receiver_no ORDER BY message_senddate

SELECT e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_id, d.dept_name, o.office_name, p.position_name FROM (SELECT emp_no, emp_name, emp_id, dept_no, office_no, position_no, emp_resigndate FROM emp WHERE emp_no IN (SELECT DISTINCT message_receiver_no FROM message WHERE message_sender_no = #{emp_no} OR message_receiver_no = #{emp_no}) AND emp_resigndate IS NULL) e, (SELECT dept_no, dept_name FROM dept) d, (SELECT office_no, office_name FROM office) o, (SELECT position_no, position_name FROM position) p WHERE e.dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.office_no = o.office_no AND e.position_no = p.position_no AND e.emp_resigndate IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message VALUES(seq_message.NEXTVAL, #{message_contents}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{message_sender_no}, #{message_receiver_no})
